0.4787787204*(1/n) = 0.0534670048
1/n = 0.0534670048/0.4787787204
1 = (0.0534670048/0.4787787204)n
1/(0.0534670048/0.4787787204) = n
8.95465759099 = n

motor rotations -> m = 0.0534670048
wheel rotations -> m = 0.4787787204


wheel diameter = 6 in = 0.1524 m
wheel circumference = 0.1524m*pi = 0.4787
